name: Batch››styler
description:
Instantly add all your selection's styles to your local file. Perfect for creating initial Design Systems from nothing. Also good for updating your Design System file when you add in new assets as it ignores any styles that already exists. Just hit CMD (CTRL) + A and run the plugin.


To get the best results, use the classic Figma slash naming convention (e.g. iOS/Icon/S) and you'll get the folders for free.
